H0.text: In Greek legend, who turned everything he touched into gold . Dionysus

H1.text: In Greek legend, who turned everything he touched into gold . Hephaestus

H2.text: In Greek legend, who turned everything he touched into gold . Helios

H3.text: In Greek legend, who turned everything he touched into gold . Midas

A4.text: The most famous King Midas is popularly remembered in Greek mythology for his ability to turn everything he touched into pure gold

A5.text: Dionysus offered Midas his choice of whatever reward he wished for. Midas asked that whatever he might touch should be changed into gold
